TopicTitle: The Tylo 3 Course : Fly by Tylo, the Mun and Moho...

Articles.Content: This missions has just popped up in my contracts building. It says i have to fly-by Tylo, the Mun and Moho IN ONE VESSEL. How might one do this? as the pay seems attractive

Ion. It's easier than you might think: you just need to get to Jool and fly by Tylo, from there you can use a gravity assist to send yourself towards the Sun, flying by Kerbin and the Mun (using a gravity assist here if needed) and go to Moho.

Requires a bit of planning but definitely doable without refueling (as long as it's just flybys).
What he said. Just make sure you have the patience and time to do so! Ions are hell and hard to use.
